0:
”Alexa, open hawthorne lane”
”Alexa, ask hawthorne lane for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start hawthorne lane”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hawthorne lane
des: Listen to the latest talks from Hawthorne Lane United Methodist Church in Charlotte North Carolina. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
